title: Conduction: Heat Through Direct Contact
description: A 60-second lesson on Conduction: Heat Through Direct Contact.

hook.text: A steak sizzles the instant it touches a hot pan. That sound is conduction at work.

buildup.text: Conduction transfers heat through direct contact between molecules vibrating into their neighbors.
